","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mt65","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eoqef","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"21q1f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aa41q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ji57","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fdlae","text":"To enrich DNA fragments of \u003e3 kb, use LFB","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"98lff","text":"To retain DNA fragments of all sizes, use SFB","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"40E273E3D7B411EE99B10A58A9FEAC02"}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"bd274","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colorless, for at least 1 minute.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"26126FCFDED911EEA7150A58A9FEAC02"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3nter","text":"Remove the supernatant using a pipette and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bubpf","text":"Thaw the flow cell, Sequencing Buffer (SQB), Loading Solution (LIS), and one tube of Flush mixture (FB \u0026 FLT) at room temperature on cooling block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b03r9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40rau","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a4mua","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5dvk6","text":"The Flush Buffer (FB) and Flush Tether (FLT) is needed to be premixed for the first time opening the tube.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"BD13B38D2AD44BF7AE10E3688400F5D0"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bokt6","text":"Place the tube of Wash Mix (WMX) on ice. Do not vortex the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vhvm","text":"Thaw one tube of Wash Diluent (DIL) at room temperature on a cooling block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lpa0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8rfbc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1qcg5","text":"Mix the contents of Wash Diluent (DIL) thoroughly by vortexing, spin down briefly and place on ice.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"2E27FE34FEC54AE8B01B598DB5949342"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"vtil","text":"In a clean 1.5 mL microtube, prepare the following Flow Cell Wash Mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54u4a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"58bfm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6pen","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a5pgn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Reagent","Volume"],"colWidths":["140",100],"data":[["Wash Mix (WMX)","1 µL"],["Wash Diluent (DIL)","199 µL"]],"guid":"06C9651247EE44128CD6C96983621301","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Wash Mix (WMX)","1 µL"],["Wash Diluent (DIL)","199 µL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"31kv8","text":"Mix well by pipetting, and place on ice. Do not vortex the tube.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"D99CD9CEF9DF49818F871580140E7C89"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cgcp","text":"Lift the sensory cover.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qfee","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46urf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rp7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eu077","text":"Ensure that the priming port cover and SpotON sample port cover are in the positions indicated in the figure below.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"559CD0A178034B60B381266983EDB50C"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nmm2","text":"Rotate the flow cell priming port cover clockwise so that the priming port is visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7ugg","text":"After opening the priming port, check for a small air bubble under the cover. Draw back a small volume to remove any bubbles:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ltoe","text":"1. Set a P1000 pipette to 800 μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"atm2d","text":"2. Insert the tip into the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gq8j","text":"3. Turn the wheel until the dial shows 820–830 μl, or until you can see a small volume of liquid entering the pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99ub3","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bgsh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"588mg","text":"Visually check that there is continuous buffer from the priming port across the sensor array.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"2B7EACB69B29464AA1B0D0F9E1E35D6B"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"863vl","text":"Load 200 μl of the prepared Flow Cell Wash Mix into the flow cell via the priming port, avoiding the introduction of air.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7el1o","text":"Close the priming port and keep into 4°C for 2 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rfn4","text":"Thaw either Long Fragment Buffer (LFB) or Short Fragment Buffer (SFB) at room temperature on a cooling block, mix by vortexing, spin down and place on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4537q","text":"Spin down the sample and pellet on a magnet. Keep the tube on the magnet, and pipette off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60hi8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fvh2","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9hdeb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"api8j","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colorless, for at least 1 minute.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"3315189FD7B411EE99B10A58A9FEAC02"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqr8j","text":"Incubate for 5 minutes at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"2DE3FE9DD7B411EE99B10A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bb4l","text":"Add 0.45X AMPure XP Beads (AXP) to the tube and mix by flicking the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pt0v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"546mp","text":"Spin down and place the tube back on the magnet. Pipette off any residual supernatant. Allow to dry for 5~30 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"133tm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8i05u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7oile","text":"Do not dry the pellet to the point of cracking.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"987454AA28D14524889DB110129CFB18"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"amv59","text":"Remove the tube from the magnetic rack and resuspend the pellet in 15 µL Elution Buffer (EB). Spin down and incubate for 10 minutes at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":135,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d8ah5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":" on an incubator","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bn02o","text":" . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"59D40BBA0D3011EFA8660A58A9FEAC02","step_guid":"59C4DD1E0D3011EFA8660A58A9FEAC02","title":"Repeat previous step"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qlpm","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colourless, for at least 1 minute.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5mvh9","text":"Leave the tube aside, and go to the priming steps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84hq0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tpkp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3aacu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1scja","text":"If you are not going to sequence the prepared library in an hour later, remove and retain 14 µl of eluate containing the DNA library into a clean 1.5 mL microtubes. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"a9t37","text":"For short-term storage or reloading flow cells between washes, you can keep the prepared libray at 4°C. While for long-sterm storage of more than 3 months, storing libraries at -80°C is recommended.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"EA2C31DE341B4BD788CE604DC78F3C67"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ek0kb","text":"Spin down the KAPA HyperPrep Ligase and place on ice immediately.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"358fv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Press down firmly on the flow cell to ensure correct thermal and electrical contact.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7bh7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2et99","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8dbk0","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9kbja","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"as73p","text":"Make sure there is no bubbles in the flow cell.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"10F1A636DEDD11EEA7150A58A9FEAC02"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"as73p","text":"Make sure there is no bubbles in the flow cell.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"0F35C0A7345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":309,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3879.PNG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iisqbm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iisnbm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iispbm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iismbm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"26vk9","text":"Slide the flow cell priming port cover clockwise to open the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79ftf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7lci9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0F39E6E4345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":309,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3878.PNG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iisubm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iissbm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iistbm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iisrbm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bmfip","text":"After opening the priming port, check for a small air bubble under the cover. Draw back a small volume to remove any bubbles: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aohn8","text":"1. Set a P1000 pipette to 800 μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"79so3","text":"2. Insert the tip into the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnifa","text":"3. Turn the wheel until the dial shows 820–230 µl, or until you can see a small volume of buffer entering the pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7agsl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f9c16","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"60bkl","text":"Visually check that there is continuous buffer from the priming port across the sensor array.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"545B1B53DEDD11EEA7150A58A9FEAC02"}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"anu3e","text":"Load 800 μl of the priming mix into the flow cell via the priming port by turning the pipet wheel, avoiding the introduction of air bubbles. Wait for 5 minutes. During this time, prepare the library for loading by following the steps below.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eiuit","text":"Complete the flow cell priming:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asogi","text":"1. Gently lift the SpotON sample port cover to make the SpotON sample port accessible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tidn","text":"2. Load 200 μl of the priming mix into the flow cell via the priming port (not the SpotON sample port), avoiding the introduction of air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8civ6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f2hro","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1lsvj","text":"Load the library as soon as possible after this step.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"D800EF03DEDE11EEA7150A58A9FEAC02"}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fj735","text":"Aspirate 12 µL of the eluted prepared library into a new 1.5 mL microtube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b36qf","text":"In that new tube, prepare the library for loading as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"627ig","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7rnnj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"88d54","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fakfo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0":{"0":"A"},"1":{"0":"_"},"2":{"0":"4"},"A_1":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"A_2":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"A_3":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"A_4":{"className":"_dt-h-left"},"B_1":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_2":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_3":{"className":"_dt-h-center"},"B_4":{"className":"_dt-h-center"}},"colTitles":["Reagent","Volume"],"colWidths":["175",100],"data":[["Sequencing Buffer (SB)","37.5 µL"],["Library Solution (LIS)","25.5 µL"]],"guid":"C5F8AAB9EC0E4EBAB2808D2B9B8F5915","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Sequencing Buffer (SB)","37.5 µL"],["Library Solution (LIS)","25.5 µL"]],"rowHeights":[23,23]}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2er39","text":"Add all the chemicals directly into the liquid.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"DC200EA85F9540D987F187F35C2C0104"}}}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"avnll","text":"Mix the prepared library gently by pipetting up and down in the tip using a P200 pipet just prior to loading.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"95ij9","text":"Add the library to the flow cell via the SpotON sample port in a dropwise fashion. Ensure each drop flows into the port before adding the next.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"27b0b","text":"Gently close the SpotON sample port cover, making sure the bung enters the SpotON port, close the priming port, cover the sensor array with the sensory cover, and close the MinION device lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iu6h","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ulm3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"0F45C559345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":309,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3877.PNG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iisybm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iiswbm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iisxbm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iisvbm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1fant","text":"Stop or pause the sequencing experiment in MinKNOW, and leave the flow cell in the device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f2cl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"181fv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"94n6f","text":"If you are not going to wash it immediately. Keep in 4°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"B9BD60D2069C4F269086AB3A1E5CC491"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"52uk5","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ogn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"gotostep","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"59E1E83A0D3011EFA8660A58A9FEAC02","step_guid":"59C85A220D3011EFA8660A58A9FEAC02","title":"Repeat this step."}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8nlfv","text":"Thaw one tube of Storage Buffer (S) at room temperature on a cooling block.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6mod7","text":"Mix contents thoroughly by pipetting and spin down briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d7i2j","text":"Take out the MinION device from 4°C fridge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cp1k6","text":"Rotate the flow cell priming port cover clockwise so that the priming port is visible. Open the device lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1tbq2","text":"After opening the priming port, check for a small air bubble under the cover. Draw back a small volume to remove any bubbles:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eson2","text":"1. Set a P1000 pipette to 800 μl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"835t3","text":"2. Insert the tip into the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1deri","text":"3. Turn the wheel until the dial shows 820–830 μl, or until you can see a small volume of liquid entering the pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8vh5k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"739d1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"588mg","text":"Visually check that there is continuous buffer from the priming port across the sensor array.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"92151D16DEE211EEA7150A58A9FEAC02"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2olc4","text":"Add 500 μl of Storage Buffer (S) through the priming port of the flow cell by turning the pipet wheel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bk5ra","text":"Close the priming port.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fasfo","text":"Using a P1000, remove all fluids from the waste channel through Waste port 2. As both the priming port and SpotON sample port are closed, no fluid should leave the sensor array area.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bi1k0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qkvk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2eeuv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"csgnn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pr32","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3qr0q","text":"It is vital that the flow cell priming port and SpotON sample port are closed to prevent air from being drawn across the sensor array area, which would lead to a significant loss of sequencing channels.","type":"unstyled"}],"collapsed":true,"entityMap":{},"guid":"FFA8566ADEE211EEA7150A58A9FEAC02"}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3qr0q","text":"It is vital that the flow cell priming port and SpotON sample port are closed to prevent air from being drawn across the sensor array area, which would lead to a significant loss of sequencing channels.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"0F620133345211EEAFD10A58A9FEAC02","height":309,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":null,\"entityMap\":null}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"IMG_3880.PNG","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iitcbm5wf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iitabm5wf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/iitbbm5wf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/iis9bm5wf.webp","width":550}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8l2tq","text":"Perform a Flow Cell Check.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b5tf4","text":"The flow cell can now be stored at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Step4. Priming and loading the SpotON flow cell
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"48qkv","text":"Quantify 1 µL of eluted sample and the original DNA library using Qubit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
